title: Chat Widget for WhatsApp
description: Developed a small-scale but impactful WhatsApp chat widget generator for Saysimple’s website, letting businesses offer a tailored way for customers to start a WhatsApp conversation.

modal.title: WhatsApp Chat Widget Generator
modal.intro: Built a <1>WhatsApp chat widget generator</1> for <1>Saysimple’s website</1> using React and Redux. The generator produces a lightweight embed built in Svelte, chosen specifically to avoid a heavy library and keep the bundle size tiny. Businesses can paste it into their sites to create a tailored WhatsApp entry point.

features.title: Key Features
list: <1>Generator in React + Redux</1> → outputs a Svelte embed (keeps bundle small, no extra library)
Copy‑paste embed snippet for any website

impact.title: Impact
impact.text: The generator lets businesses configure and publish a WhatsApp entry point on their site in minutes. The Svelte embed loads fast and hands off to WhatsApp for the conversation, reducing friction and increasing conversation starts. Separately, a pricing calculator I built adds another interactive touchpoint on their site.
